content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Mar 08 (APP):Newly elected Senator Asad Qasim took oath on Saturday as a member of the Upper House of Parliament. Chairman Senate Yousaf Raza Gillani administered the oath. Asad Qasim was elected as an independent candidate from Balochistan for a general seat that was left vacant following the resignation of his father, former Senator Muhammad Qasim Roonjho.
